content:
Certainly! Some of the notable artists who have received the Pollock-Krasner grant include:

- Mark Bradford
- Kara Walker
- Robert Gober
- David Salle
- Elizabeth Murray
- Frank Stella
- Chuck Close
- Julie Mehretu
- Kiki Smith
- Jasper Johns
- Joan Mitchell
- Lee Krasner (the widow of Jackson Pollock, who endowed the grant)
